pyoptools.misc.cmisc¶

Function List¶

Available Functions¶

pyoptools.misc.cmisc.dot_test(mat, vec)¶
pyoptools.misc.cmisc.test_1(matrix)¶
pyoptools.misc.cmisc.test_2(vector)¶
pyoptools.misc.cmisc.unwrap(inph, in_p=(), double uv=2*np.pi, int nn =1)¶

Return the input matrix unwrapped using the value given in uv. nn indicates how many nearest neighbours are going to be used in the unwrap procedure.

The same as unwrapv, but using for-s
